title: The Prince of Manhattan
description: For Miranda Hazelgrove, life is relatively boring and humdrum, as a young student in New York she spends most of her time just trying to make end's meet. For Leofric son of Cedric, life is wild and turbulent, after being exiled from his throne and on the run he finds himself in a strange city unlike anything he's ever seen. A stranger from another time, he struggles to survive in his new environment until by chance his path crosses with Miranda's, changing both of their lives forever.
author: Alexei Iskander
